page.title: 13INDUSTRY IN NORTH FAREHAM
page.content: The majority of people who live in North Fareham are employed in agriculture,either as farm owners, farm managers or farm workers.There are many self-employed market gardeners involved in horticulture.Another major employer is Knowle Hospital.Many of the doctors, nurses,catering staff,cleaners, porters and teachers live in either wickham or Funtley villages,or on the northern outskirts of Fareham.Many of the Funtley villagers work at Funtley Abattoir(which is west of this block) which slaughters and prepares animals from local farms for the meat market both in Britain and abroad.Pink's sawmills also employ local labour to cut transport and prepare timber.There are no other significant industries or employers.
